class.name: LayeredTileData
class.brief_description: Settings for a single tile in a [LayeredTileSet].
class.description: [LayeredTileData] object represents a single tile in a [LayeredTileSet]. It is usually edited using the tileset editor, but it can be modified at runtime using [method LayeredTileMap._tile_data_runtime_update].

method.name: add_collision_polygon
method.description: Adds a collision polygon to the tile on the given LayeredTileSet physics layer.

method.name: get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Returns the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Returns the points of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Returns how many polygons the tile has for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant angular velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant linear velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_custom_data
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer named [param layer_name].

method.name: get_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: get_navigation_polygon
method.description: Returns the navigation polygon of the tile for the LayeredTileSet navigation layer with index [param layer_id]. [param flip_h], [param flip_v], and [param transpose] allow transforming the returned polygon.

method.name: get_occluder
method.description: Returns the occluder polygon of the tile for the LayeredTileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id]. [param flip_h], [param flip_v], and [param transpose] allow transforming the returned polygon.

method.name: get_terrain_peering_bit
method.description: Returns the tile's terrain bit for the given [param peering_bit] direction.

method.name: is_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Returns whether one-way collisions are enabled for the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: remove_collision_polygon
method.description: Removes the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Sets the points of the polygon at index [param polygon_index] for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Sets the polygons count for LayeredTileSet physics layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant angular velocity. This does not rotate the tile. This angular velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant linear velocity. This does not move the tile. This linear velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile. This is useful to create conveyor belts.

method.name: set_custom_data
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the LayeredTileSet custom data layer with name [param layer_name].

method.name: set_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the LayeredTileSet custom data layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Sets the navigation polygon for the LayeredTileSet navigation layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_occluder
method.description: Sets the occluder for the LayeredTileSet occlusion layer with index [param layer_id].

method.name: set_terrain_peering_bit
method.description: Sets the tile's terrain bit for the given [param peering_bit] direction.

signal.name: changed
signal.description: Emitted when any of the properties are changed.
